level.heading: Parking spaces.
level.text: ยง 27-292.19 Parking spaces.--(a) Where parking areas or garages are provided, at least one parking space but not less than five percent of the total number of parking spaces provided shall be suitable for use by people having physical disabilities. Where determination by percentage results in a number containing a decimal of 0.5 or more, the next higher number shall be used. (b) Location, space, size and signage for parking spaces suitable for use by people having physical disabilities shall comply with provisions set forth in reference standard RS 4-6.
